pinyin: gong1 ji1 xing2 he2 qian2 ting3

sentences.english: Under government policy, British nuclear submarines carry a maximum of 48 warheads.
sentences.chinese: 据政府政策规定，英国核潜艇最多可装载48颗弹头。

sentences.english: and an aging Challenger-class diesel submarine, the Conqueror.
sentences.chinese: 和老化的挑战者级柴油潜艇“征服者”。

sentences.english: In eats machine in the family, the antisubmarine aircraft is submarine's natural enemy.
sentences.chinese: 在吃机家族中，反潜机是潜艇的天敌。
潜艇发射的导弹相当的准确。

sentences.english: The submarine underwater motion is the multi-stance 3D movement.
sentences.chinese: 潜艇水下运动是多姿态的三维空间运动。

sentences.english: ASDIC is an acronym for antisubmarine detection investigation committee.
sentences.chinese: 是“反潜艇侦查调查委员会”的缩写形式。

sentences.english: A mini-submarine was called in to help the search for bodies, along with divers.
sentences.chinese: 一艘微型潜艇被征召，以配合潜水员搜索尸体。

sentences.english: How effective is the modern submarine?
sentences.chinese: 那么，现代潜艇到底有多牛？

sentences.english: Ten years later I read night of the U-boat and able to complete the story.
sentences.chinese: 十年后，我读着《潜艇之夜》，终于了解故事的始末。

sentences.english: In fact, speakers of Russian would say that submarines do swim.
sentences.chinese: 事实上俄语的使用者确实会说“潜艇能游”。

sentences.english: It's the first submerged circumnavigation of the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 这是第一次核潜艇环球水下航行。

sentences.english: The captain dived his submarine deep to escape from the destroyers.
sentences.chinese: 海军上校使他的潜艇深深下潜以逃避驱逐艇。

sentences.english: Submarine motion at the periscope depth, will suffer the interference that comes from waves.
sentences.chinese: 潜艇在潜望镜深度航行时，会受到来自波浪的干扰力。

sentences.english: In this article, structure optimization and analysis of a cylindrical pressure-resisting hull of submersible vessel are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了潜艇圆筒形耐压壳体结构的分析与优化。

sentences.english: During World War II he served in the Navy aboard the submarine tender U.S.S. Proteus.
sentences.chinese: 二战期间他在海军潜艇供应船普罗特斯号服役。

sentences.english: New submarines could help challenge any Chinese seaborne assault on the self-governing island, which Beijing reserves the right to take by force.
sentences.chinese: 新潜艇或将帮助台湾挑战中国大陆的海上进攻力量。
